GfxTextureParameters

typedef struct {
  GfxTextureWrapping  s_wrapping;
  GfxTextureWrapping  t_wrapping;
  ColorVec4           border_color;
  GfxTextureFiltering min_filtering;
  GfxTextureFiltering mag_filtering;
  float               lod_bias;
  bool                generate_mipmaps;
} GfxTextureParameters;
type: C struct

GfxCubeImage

typedef struct {
  Image *right;
  Image *left;
  Image *top;
  Image *bottom;
  Image *back;
  Image *front;
} GfxCubeImage;
